Actions.Name: Acid Rain
Actions.Description: At the start of combat, the [name] creates a medium blast terrain effect in free space in range 6. Characters that end their turn inside the terrain effect take piercing damage equal to the round number +2. The [name] can redirect the terrain effect as part of this round action, moving it 3 spaces in any direction.

Actions.Name: Fetid Wind
Actions.Description: All foes are shoved 1 in the same direction.

Actions.Name: Dissolution
Actions.Effects: An ally in range  is dissolved into poisonous gas. That ally sacrifices 15, but gains flying and becomes intangible until the start of their next turn.
